title: U.S., Cuba Work On Plans To Upgrade Diplomatic Posts
teaser: At the State Department on Friday the U.S. and Cuba held high level talks as they try to thaw a half century freeze in relations. They are working on plans to upgrade diplomatic posts in Havana and Washington, D.C. to full embassies.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
